com.tecacet.jflat
Class FlatFileReader<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.tecacet.jflat.FlatFileReader<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
StructuredFileReader<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSVReader
public class FlatFileReader<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StructuredFileReader<T>

Reads a flat file into a collection of beans. It uses a LineParser to parse each line into tokens and a ReaderRowMapper to convert the tokens to beans.

Author:
Dimitri Papaioannou

public java.util.List<T> readAll()

Description copied from interface: StructuredFileReader
Reads the entire file into a List. Each element is a bean of type T produced by the RowMapper
